name: january
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A1 the first month of the year, after December and before February: Her father died in January. His birthday is 25 January. We're going skiing next January.
More examplesFewer examplesHer birthday is in January.The sports centre always gets a lot of new members in January.I'm hoping to go to Brazil in January.We moved house in January.
